page.title: 03Recreation. School girl
page.content: My name is Hannah. Sometimes I go out and play, but I don't do it all the time. I play with my cousin Louise. We play on our roller skates.Sometimes I stay in and listen to my tapes on my personal cassette player. The tapes are Wham, my favourite group.Sometimes I put posters on my bedroom wall. I have many posters, My favourite one is a great big poster of George Michael. Sometimes I watch T.V. I like to watch police programmes.My favourite is T.J. Hooker.I also like comedy programmes. My favourites are Roll over Beethoven, Auf Weidersein Pet and That's my boy! I love to read mystery stories. The Hardy boys are my favourite detectives Every Monday I have a piano lesson. I can play Serenade,Coppelia,Orpheus in the Under-world and the Entertainer.
